Title: Face Care Tub Kit
Description:
200ml Face & Beard Wash : Gentle on the skin and effective enough to work on a rough, coarse beard; Conditions stubble and soothes irritation
30ml Beard Oil : Soften Stiff, Brittle, & Unruly Beards: Growing out a beard is an ultra-manly thing to do, but spending hours on end grooming your beard isn’t. Bryan & Candy Beard Oil penetrates every single hair in your beard to provide for smoothness and manageability.
50gm Face & Beard Moisturizer : lightweight care moisturizes your skin all day long without leaving your skin or beard feeling greasy
100gm Clay Face Mask : Exfoliates & lightens dark spots – Also reduces inflammation, pimples, acne & other bothersome skin concerns. It acts as overall skins detox, and helps in reducing pigmentation.
100gm De Tan Face Scrub : This De Tan Face scrub gently exfoliate the delicate facial skin , It scrubs away the impurities and reveals a clear, glowing skin that looks fresh and youthful, and nourished.

Title: Luxurious Shower Gel Combo Kit Gift Set For Women and Men
Description:
Bath & Shower Gels of 100ml each with five different fragrances that will make you smell like a dream. 
Get up, detoxify and conquer the world with Bryan & Candy’s Luxury Shower Essentials.
All products are enriched with natural ingredients and Bryan & Candy’s signature collection of three most popular fragrances for women.
A delightful gift for someone who deserves to be pampered with luxuries.

Hydrating & Nourishing: Experience deep hydration and nourishment with our luxurious shower gel.


Refreshing Fragrances: Indulge in a variety of invigorating scents, from soothing lavender to zesty lemon.


Gentle Cleansing: Gently cleanse and purify your skin, removing impurities without stripping away moisture.


pH 5.5 Balanced: Maintain your skin's natural pH level for a healthier and more radiant complexion.


Skin Rejuvenation: Rejuvenate your skin with each shower, leaving it feeling refreshed and revitalized.


Soothing & Relaxing: Unwind and relax with the calming benefits of our shower gel, promoting tranquility.


Creamy Lather: Enjoy a luxurious bathing experience with a rich, creamy lather that envelops your skin.


Radiant Glow: Achieve a radiant and healthy glow as our shower gel leaves your skin soft and supple.


Cruelty-Free Formula: Our shower gel is never tested on animals, ensuring guilt-free pampering.


Travel-Friendly: Conveniently sized at 100ml each, perfect for on-the-go indulgence wherever you wander.

Title: FACE & BODY CARE KIT (PACK OF 5) - FACE WASH/ FACE SCRUB /FACE MASK / COFFEE SUGAR BODY SCRUB / CHOCO BODY BUTTER
Description:
PREMIUM COFFEE BODY CARE GIFTING: Infused with Pure Coffee, Ceramides, Hyaluronic acid, Macadamia oil, Argan oil and Oatmeal powder, this Coffee Face & Body care kit comes with Coffee Face Wash, Coffee Face Scrub, Coffee Face Mask and a Super gentle Duo for Dead skin exfoliation with Coffee Sugar Body Scrub & Choco Body Butter.


COFFEE FACE CARE: The Coffee Face Wash, Coffee Face scrub & Coffee Face masks are enriched with Pure Coffee, Ceramides & Hyaluronic Acid. Coffee reduces redness, inflammation and puffiness, Ceramides promote collagen production & Hyaluronic acid gives intense moisturization.


COFFEE BODY CARE: Coffee Sugar Body scrubs exfoliate gently compared to any other Dry scrubs or salt scrubs. This Skin friendly pH 5.5 formula is loaded with Macadamia & Argan Oils which assists in cell regeneration, prevents chapping, nourishes skin while exfoliating. Choco Body Butter is enriched Ceramides and hyaluronic acid makes the skin smooth and deeply nourished. Cocoa and Shea butter gives intense moisturization and improves complexion. Its soft, non-oily and absorbs very quickly into the skin. You will love the aroma of this Choco Body Butter



NOTHING HARSH & ABRASIVE: Sugar is a natural humectant which protects the skin while exfoliation unlike the dry coffee scrubs. Sugar gets dissolved while scrubbing and makes a thin layer of protective barrier to retain skin’s moisture.



GOOD FOR YOU, GOOD FOR THE ENVIRONMENT: Bryan & Candy is the First Bath & Body Care brand focussed on making products with a Skin friendly pH 5.5 and suitable for all skin types which elevates your personal care regimen. We are a 100% Vegan friendly, Sulphate & Paraben free, use 100% Recyclable packaging, Clean and Cruelty-free brand.

Title: BODY POLISHING KIT – COFFEE SUGAR BODY SCRUB / CHOCO BODY BUTTER
Description:
EXFOLIATES, REMOVES TAN, MOISTURIZES: Coffee with Sugar in this scrub exfoliates gently compared to any other dry scrubs or salt scrubs. Sugar granules are even, polished and non- abrasive to the skin. It helps to unclog pores and remove textured skin that can lead to those pesky ingrown hairs.

LOADED WITH GOODNESS: This Skin friendly pH 5.5 formula is loaded with Macadamia & Argan Oils which assists in cell regeneration, prevents chapping, nourishes skin while exfoliating. Provides excellent moisturization, soothes sunburn and makes firm & younger looking skin.

NOTHING HARSH & ABRASIVE: Sugar is a natural humectant which protects the skin while exfoliation unlike the dry coffee scrubs. Sugar gets dissolved while scrubbing and makes a thin layer of protective barrier to retain skin’s moisture.

FRUIT AHAs & OATMEAL: Oatmeal extract, glycerin and fruit AHA’s polishes the skin to become smooth and less bumpy. Oatmeal powder is a terrific natural skin cleanser - sloughs away dirt & dead skin cells to reveal brighter complexion. Reduces skin irritation with great emollient properties.

CERAMIDES & HYALURONIC ACID: Choco Body Butter is enriched Ceramides and hyaluronic acid makes the skin smooth and deeply nourished. Cocoa and Shea butter gives intense moisturization and improves complexion. Its soft, non-oily and absorbs very quickly into the skin. You will love the aroma of this Choco Body Butter.

GOOD FOR YOU, GOOD FOR THE ENVIRONMENT: Bryan & Candy is the First Bath & Body Care brand focussed on making products with a Skin friendly pH 5.5 and suitable for all skin types which elevates your personal care regimen. We are a 100% Vegan friendly, Sulphate & Paraben free, use 100% Recyclable packaging, Clean and Cruelty-free brand.

Direction for use for all Sugar body scrubs: Take enough quantity of sugar body scrub and apply gently to the wet body. Use water if required and rub in circular motion for even coverage and effective exfoliation. Use all over your body for 3-4 minutes until the sugar granules become small and get dissolved. Rinse well with warm water, pat dry and follow up with Bryan & Candy body butter for smooth and nourished skin.

Item Form


Spray




Item Weight

Quantity: 115 ML ( Pack of 5) , Item Form: Spray
Body Mist with long aroma for whole day long. Safe to be sprayed directly on skin for long lasting freshness
Convenient travel friendly pack. Helps you to have aromatherapy on the go any time anywhere
Wrap yourself in the luxury of this irresistible scent and reveal your natural romantic self
Usage: Give it a good hard shake first to make sure all the ingredients are mixed together before you spray it. You should hold the can approximately 15cm from your body or clothes as you spray it.

Title: Discover Women's Perfume Set | 4 Unique Scents
Description:
A set of 4 long-lasting and soothing fragrances curated for the modern woman
Includes four unique perfumes: Enigma, Delicate Rose, Icandy, and Illusion
Each perfume contains 8ml of fragrance
Provides a variety of fragrances to choose from, suitable for different moods and occasions
Enigma: a hypnotic blend of fruity flavors and floral elegance
Delicate Rose: a fresh and delicate rose fragrance with a modern twist
Icandy : a fruity and floral fragrance with a long-lasting and soothing effect
Illusion: a woody and musky fragrance with a hint of floral and fruity notes
Designed to evoke a sense of sophistication and elegance, with a modern touch
A great gift for a loved one or for treating yourself to a new fragrance experience.

Title: Men's Perfume (EDP) Discovery Set
Description:
Bryan & Candy Men's Discovery Set Perfume is a collection of four distinct and unique fragrances: Inspire, Magnate, Triumph, and Aqua Sport.
Each fragrance comes in a compact 8ml bottle, making it easy to carry and use on-the-go.
The perfumes are all eau de parfum (EDP), which means they have a higher concentration of fragrance oils and are longer lasting compared to eau de toilette (EDT) or cologne.
The fragrances in this set are carefully curated and crafted to offer a range of scents that suit different moods and occasions.
The soothing fragrances are designed to evoke a sense of confidence and sophistication in the wearer, making them perfect for the man of today.
The Bryan & Candy Men's Discovery Set Perfume offers a great opportunity to sample and discover new fragrances, or to gift to someone special who enjoys quality and long-lasting perfumes.

Title: Activated Charcoal Kit for Men & Women ( Pack of 3)
Description:
Activated Organic Bamboo Charcoal Face Wash 100ml – Activated Organic Bamboo Charcoal helps to exfoliate and cleanse all the impurities, and dirt from the face that is caused by pollution and other contaminants. Vitamin E has antioxidant properties that reduce oxidative stress and is very good for the skin; beard hair. Provitamin B5 helps prevent moisture loss and helps to smooth the skin prevent dryness. Allantoin soothes and protects the skin.
Activated Charcoal Face Scrub 100ml – Activated Organic Bamboo Charcoal helps to exfoliate and cleanse all the impurities; dirt from the face that is caused by pollution and other contaminants. Organic Aloe vera hydrates and rejuvenates the skin naturally.  Vitamin E is a powerful antioxidant that helps reduce free radical damage and protects the skin cells. It helps to protect the skin against aging, inflammation, and sun damage, thereby making your skin softer, brighter and more supple.
Activated Organic Bamboo Charcoal Bath & Shower Gel 200 ml – Masculine Scent will leave you with a refreshed bathing experience. All-Natural ingredients, Activated Charcoal, Organic Aloe vera, Provitamin B5 and Vit E energize and cleanse your skin.
These gift boxes for men & women have been designed to cater to various aspects of life.
We love animals and so we Do Not Test our products on Animals.

Title: Superio Complete Face & Body Care Kit
Description:
Bryan and Candy Superio Complete Face and Body Care Kit for Men offers a comprehensive range of grooming essentials, ensuring a head-to-toe grooming experience.
The kit includes a refreshing shower gel that cleanses and rejuvenates the body, leaving you feeling refreshed and energized.
Nourish and revitalize your skin with the included face mask, which provides deep hydration and helps improve the overall appearance of your skin.
The face wash and face scrub work together to deeply cleanse your skin, removing impurities and dead skin cells, promoting a smoother and clearer complexion.
Bryan and Candy Superio products are cruelty-free, meaning no animals were harmed during their development and production.
All products in the kit are free from sulfates and parabens, ensuring safer and healthier skincare.
The kit is a perfect gifting option for men, offering a complete set of grooming products that cater to their specific needs.





Each product in the kit is carefully selected to provide a comprehensive grooming routine, covering essential aspects of face and body care.
Suitable for all skin types, the Bryan and Candy Superio Complete Face and Body Care Kit addresses specific skincare concerns and promotes overall skin health.
Elevate your self-care routine with this high-quality grooming kit, designed to enhance your grooming experience and leave you feeling confident and refreshed.

Title: Coffee Bath Tub Kit
Description:
Elevate your bathing routine with the luxurious Bryan and Candy Coffee Bath Tub Kit.
This indulgent set includes a Coffee Face Wash, Face Scrub, Face Mask, Bath and Shower Gel, Choco Body Butter, and a Bathing Bar.
Infused with the enchanting aroma of coffee, it provides a sensory delight during every use.
Gently exfoliate and rejuvenate your skin with the coffee-infused Face Scrub and Face Mask.
The Bath and Shower Gel cleanses and moisturizes, leaving you feeling refreshed and invigorated.
The Choco Body Butter provides deep hydration and a tempting chocolate fragrance.
Bryan and Candy's Coffee Bathing Bar offers a revitalizing cleansing experience.
Perfect for gifting, it makes an ideal present for loved ones.
This kit is free from parabens, sulphates, and maintains a pH level of 5.5, ensuring gentle and balanced care for your skin.
It's also vegan-friendly, adhering to ethical skincare practices. Transform your bath time into a spa-like experience with this exquisite kit.
